alert.note: Alert for Presidio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 28 at 8:37AM CDT until May 29 at 12:24AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Rio Grande at Presidio International Bridge affecting Presidio County. Rio Grande below Presidio 5SE affecting Presidio County. Rio Grande at Castolon affecting Brewster County. .Thunderstorms Saturday night produced heavy rainfall along the Rio Grande from Presidio to Castolon, resulting in minor flooding of the river. For the Rio Grande...including Presidio International Bridge, Presidio 5SE, Castolon, Johnson Ranch...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rio Grande below Presidio 5SE. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet (2.7 meters), the river reaches minor flood stage, and low lying areas begin to flood. At 11.0 feet (3.4 meters), minor flooding continues along the river. Irrigation pumps may need to be removed. No threats to residences or other structures are known to occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 10.3 feet (3.1 meters). - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 AM CDT Sunday was 12.4 feet (3.8 meters). - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 3.0 feet (0.9 meters) Friday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet (2.7 meters). - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.1 feet (2.8 meters) on 09/22/2022. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Below are the latest river stages and forecasts (feet): Fld Observed Sun Sun Mon Mon Location Stg Stg Day/Time 1pm 7pm 1am 7am Rio Grande Presidio 5SE 9.0 10.3 Sun 8am 8.8 4.5 3.7 3.5 Below are the latest river stages and forecasts (meters): Fld Observed Sun Sun Mon Mon Location Stg Stg Day/Time 1pm 7pm 1am 7am Rio Grande Presidio 5SE 2.7 3.1 Sun 8am 2.7 1.4 1.1 1.1 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 845 PM CDT.
